    Class Description
    FirebaseHandler
    FirebaseHandler Handle firebase for storaging data Public Methods: addUsernameEmailTuple (String, String) -> void : create an extra table to help distinguish occupied email and support email login feature removeUser() -> void: remove current logged user
    ISBNAdapter
    ISBNAdapter Tools for handling scan book's ISBN
    ISBNWebAPIAdapter
    ISBNWebAdapter Tools for search ISBN from google apis
    MyRecyclerViewAdapter
    MyRecyclerViewAdapter Handle books consist with their image(Book cover)
    NotificationAdapter
    NotificationAdapter Tools for handling sending notification to specific user when an action of a book has taken
    RequestAdapter
    RequestAdapter Tools for handling search book from book list
    SearchBookAdapter
    SearchBookAdapter Tools for handling search book from book list
